EmailTemplate.name: 202004_Global_Honeywell_Forge_Dispatch_Services_Webinar.In Case You Missed It Ap
EmailTemplate.subject: Now on demand — View our Honeywell Forge Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Did you miss our webinar, Learn About Honeywell Forge Dispatch Services and the Honeywell Forge Dashboard? It’s now on-demand <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/rec/share/vONMBJz0yFJJQ6PEzU7EUaAgNdjfaaa81yQe-KAPzEwQUFc_x2LXSWnsHRC_oYLA?startTime=1586964904000]]>, should you like to view it.
Please use code learn333# to access.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more. Sign up here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>.
We look forward to seeing you next time!
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace WATCH NOW <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/rec/share/vONMBJz0yFJJQ6PEzU7EUaAgNdjfaaa81yQe-KAPzEwQUFc_x2LXSWnsHRC_oYLA?startTime=1586964904000]]>
